Unfortunately I cannot correlate this with anything that I did (other than hitting ctrl+s).
I should mention that I kept getting this exception on each subsequent save until I did a "Build AspectJ Project" (i.e. a full rebuild).

I believe this is the same problem as bug 119882 - and although it has been fixed in AspectJ, i'm not sure it has made it into an AJDT build yet.  We are working on AJDT right now, so the fix should be through in a couple of days.
Closing this bug as fixed as the latest AJDT builds (both for Eclipse 3.1 and 3.2M5a) contain the fix for bug 119882.
